channel.title: Personal on Ojas Tapadia
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Ojas Tapadia

item.title: Starting My Own Blog!
item.description:
I love watching videos of NetworkChuck and recently he published a video and I WAS HOOKED! In the video, he references Building a Second Brain by Tiago Forte, and I have been reading it since then, and I love it!

Making a blog has always been something that I wanted to do, but lacked in skills and insights that I can provide. But after reading, even a few chapters of it, I can’t help make a blog or second brain of my own.
